mapper.select: select sb.sb_num, sb.sb_title, re.r_receiver, sb.sb_content, sb.sb_passwd, sb.e_num, sb.sb_regdate, sb.sb_readcount FROM SURVEY_BOARD sb, RECIPIENT re WHERE sb.r_num = re.r_num AND sb.sb_num BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: update survey_board set sb_readcount=sb_readcount+1 WHERE sb_num=#{sb_num}
mapper.select: select sb.sb_num, sb.sb_title, re.r_receiver, sb.sb_content, sb.sb_passwd, sb.e_num, sb.sb_regdate, sb.sb_readcount FROM SURVEY_BOARD sb, RECIPIENT re WHERE sb.r_num = re.r_num AND sb.sb_num = #{sb_num}

select sr.sq_num, sq.sq_text, sr.sa_num, sa.sa_item from survey_board sb, survey_result sr, survey_answer sa, survey_question sq where sb.sb_num=sr.sb_num AND sr.sa_num=sa.sa_num AND sr.sq_num=sq.sq_num AND sr.sb_num=#{sb_num} order by 1
